content: immerse yourself in the whimsical world of crochet with our blue whale zipper pouch pattern the pattern includes detailed written instructions and a helpful video tutorial to guide you through the process worked in the round this pouch features a sturdy seamed construction that ensures durability the finished pouch measures approximately 10 x 10 x 6 making it the perfect size for storing your essentials dive into this fun and engaging project today **unique features-** intermediate-level challenge for experienced crocheters detailed written pattern with right and left-handed video tutorials sturdy seamed construction for durability perfect size for storing essentials **materials needed-** us-l 8 0 mm crochet hook **susan bates** https //amzn to/4bohtuj 105 yds **bernat blanket** https //amzn to/4pojy1k 6 - super bulky 100% polyester 300g/10 5 oz 201 m/220 yds **stitch markers** https //amzn to/3tyhdg4 2 **24mm safety eyes** https //amzn to/3lsulzv **9 white yarn zip** https //www dpbolvw net/click-101374852-13781485 url=https%3a%2f%2fwww yarnspirations com%2fproducts%2fcoats-clark-yarn-zip%3fvariant%3d49177379275067
